products.description_en: Ultra-high resolution displays with pixel pitches from P0.9 to P1.56, perfect for control rooms, broadcast studios, and corporate environments.
products.description_zh: 像素间距从P0.9到P1.56的超高分辨率显示屏，完美适用于控制室、广播演播室和企业环境。
products.specifications:
Pixel Pitch: P0.9-P1.56
Resolution: 4K/8K
Brightness: 600-1200 nits
Refresh Rate: 3840Hz
Viewing Angle: 160°/160°
products.features: 4K/8K Resolution, Seamless Splicing, High Refresh Rate

products.description_en: Weather-resistant displays for outdoor advertising and information with high brightness and energy efficiency.
products.description_zh: 适用于户外广告和信息显示的防风雨显示屏，具有高亮度和节能特性。
products.specifications:
Pixel Pitch: P3-P10
Brightness: 5000-8000 nits
IP Rating: IP65
Operating Temperature: -40°C to +60°C
Viewing Distance: 3-100m
products.features: IP65 Waterproof, High Brightness, Energy Efficient

products.description_en: Portable and quick-setup displays for events and temporary installations with lightweight and durable design.
products.description_zh: 适用于活动和临时安装的便携式快速安装显示屏，具有轻量化和耐用的设计。
products.specifications:
Pixel Pitch: P2.6-P4.81
Weight: 6-8kg/panel
Setup Time: <30min
Connection: Quick Lock
Flight Case: Available

products.description_en: Custom-shaped displays for unique architectural and artistic applications with flexible design options.
products.description_zh: 适用于独特建筑和艺术应用的定制形状显示屏，具有灵活的设计选项。
products.specifications:
Shape: Customizable
Pixel Pitch: P1.25-P10
Curve Radius: R≥500mm
Installation: Flexible
Control: Professional
products.features: Custom Shapes, Flexible Design, Artistic Integration

products.description_en: Innovative transparent displays that blend seamlessly with architecture while delivering stunning visual impact.
products.description_zh: 与建筑完美融合的创新透明显示屏，同时提供令人惊叹的视觉冲击。
products.specifications:
Transparency: 70-90%
Pixel Pitch: P3.91-P7.81
Brightness: 4000-6000 nits
Weight: 12kg/m²
Maintenance: Front/Rear
